name: Devstral Small 1.0 (2505)
description: 24B parameter open-weight model for software engineering agents. Achieves 53.6% on SWE-Bench Verified. Runs on single 4090 GPU.
notes: Released May 2025 under Apache 2.0. Fine-tuned from Mistral Small 3.1. Optimized for agentic coding workflows, codebase exploration, multi-file edits.
